  • Uses of RegionScanner in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

    Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver that implement RegionScanner
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    (package private) class 
    RegionScannerImpl
    RegionScannerImpl is used to combine scanners from multiple Stores (aka column families).
    (package private) class 
    ReversedRegionScannerImpl
    ReversibleRegionScannerImpl extends from RegionScannerImpl, and is used to support reversed scanning.
